UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Pse-T2, an antimicrobial peptide with High-Level, Broad-Spectrum Antimicrobial Potency and Skin Biocompatibility against Multidrug-resistant Pseudomonas aeruginosa infection.
Literature.Author: Kang HK, Seo C, Luchian T, Park Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:12.30% Hemolysis=100 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:13.8% Cytotoxicity=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1998(MIC=8µM),Listeria monocytogenes KCTC 3710(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=4µM),Candida albicans KCTC 7270(MIC=16µM),Trichosporon beigelii KCTC 7707(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3518(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3090(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli CCARM 1229(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli CCARM 1238(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 4007(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 4891(MIC=8µM)
